author: EmyrClement
body:
#### PR description:

An extension to #27823, #28028, #27941, these changes will now run the APV dynamic gain simulation for the the TID and TEC wheels (previously not included).  The modelling of the dynamic gain in a particular strip hasn't changed.

#### PR validation:

Tested locally, performance of the algorithm in TIB and TOB is unchanged as expected (similar data-MC agreement as before), and improved description of data seen in TID and TEC layers.
title: Simulate APV dynamic gain in TID and TEC
